title: How to warranty in the un-support region and buy via a reseller.?
content: Last month I buy a Google Pixel 3XL device from a reseller in Vietnam. Only the real charger and device. After a month I realize that my pixel only can on-screen under 4h a day. I'm really upset about this because to buy this phone I must be saved money for such a long time :(. So all I want is that I can find a way to can be warranty my device battery in Google service. I hope the Google support team could help me and open a Google service in Vietnam asap. Thank you for your reading.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
